id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield

key.description: The key or name of the metafield

value.description: The actual value of the metafield

value_type.description: The data type of the metafield value

owner_id.description: The unique identifier of the resource that owns the metafield

created_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was created

updated_at.description: The date and time when the metafield was last updated

owner_resource.description: The type of resource that owns the metafield

type.description: The type of the metafield value

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the metafield in the Shopify GraphQL Admin API

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the metafield is associated
